thread.title: MoneyTV with Donald Baillargeon, 10/9
thread.title_full: MoneyTV with Donald Baillargeon, 10/9 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: MoneyTV with Donald Baillargeon, 10/9
text:
MoneyTV; CLS Holdings USA , Inc.; Kimberly Parry Organics, Inc.; Singlepoint, Inc.; The Green Polka Dot Box, Inc.; XsunX, Inc.; PeerLogix, Inc.
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 9, South Caroline floods, science of cannabis extraction, advertising to torrent users, non-gmo food, text2bid, solar, organic skin care; this week on MoneyTV with Donald Baillargeon . MoneyTV is the internationally syndicated television program all about money and what makes it happen, ( http://www.moneytv.net ), featuring informative interviews with company CEOs, providing insights into their operations and outlooks for their futures.
Free information packages from the featured companies can be requested by sending an email to info@moneytv.net .
The television program can also be viewed online immediately at www.moneytv.net .
Featured companies on this week's program include:
CLS Holdings USA , Inc. (OTCQB: CLSH) Chairman & CEO Jeffrey Binder spoke of the company's science of cannabis extraction and conversion.
Kimberly Parry Organics, Inc. (OTCPINK: KPOC) CEO Kimberly Parry explained the benefits behind the company's relocation to St. George, UT .
Singlepoint, Inc. (OTCPINK: SING) CEO Greg Lambrecht announced their auditors have completed their work in the company's effort to uplist the stock.
PeerLogix, Inc. (OTCQB: LOGX) CEO William Gorfein explained why advertisers are very interested in the torrent users LOGX can deliver banner ads to.
The Green Polka Dot Box, Inc. (OTCPINK: GPDB) CEO Rod Smith said company sales will increase dramatically in Q4.
XsunX, Inc. (OTCPINK: XSNX) CEO Tom Djokovich announced the company has attractive financing programs available as they expand into the residential solar installation market.
A complete menu of TV listings is available at the MoneyTV web site, http://www.moneytv.net .
MoneyTV Executive Producer and Anchor Donald Baillargeon is also the host of MoneyRap Radio, http://www.moneyrap.com and the daily television program Global Financial News Minute with Donald Baillargeon .
MoneyTV with Donald Baillargeon television program, Copyright MMXV, all rights reserved. MoneyTV does not provide an analysis of companies' financial positions and is not soliciting to purchase or sell securities of the companies, nor are we offering a recommendation of featured companies or their stocks. Information discussed herein has been provided by the companies and should be verified independently with the companies and a securities analyst. MoneyTV provides companies a 3 to 4 month corporate profile with multiple appearances for a cash fee of $11,995.00 to $17,250.00, does not accept company stock as payment for services, does not hold any positions, options or warrants in featured companies. The information herein is not an endorsement by Donald Baillargeon, the producer, publisher or parent company of MoneyTV.
